title: What's Medicare Supplement Insurance (Medigap)?
cleaned_text: What's Medicare Supplement Insurance (Medigap)? Medicare Supplement Insurance (Medigap) is extra insurance you can buy from a private health insurance company to help pay your share of out-of-pocket costs in [ Original Medicare ]. You must have Original Medicare - both [ Part A (Hospital Insurance) ] and [ Part B (Medical Insurance) ] - to buy a Medigap policy. What do you want to do?
